entry.title: MRepoApp/MRepo
entry.summary:
A Manager for Magisk Modules

MRepo

MRepo (short for My Repository or Modules(Magisk) Repository) is an Android app that helps manage your own modules repository.

MRepo is written with Jetpack Compose.

Preview

Features

  • Jetpack Compose & Material Design 3
  • Download and update modules
  • Your own modules repository
  • Support multiple repositories

Supported Versions

  • Android 8.0 ~ 14
  • Magisk 24.0 ~ latest
  • KernelSU 0.5.0 ~ latest

Modules Repository

  • magisk-modules-repo-util: the util to help build modules repository
  • MRepoApp/magisk-modules-alt-repo: a mirror of Magisk-Modules-Alt-Repo

Credits

  • tabler/tabler-icons
